value.description: An installed archotech eye. Archotech eyes are among the most potent implants one can install for soldiers. No matter if one is a wimpy recruit or a hardened veteran, these will bring the recruit up to par and give the veteran the ability to absolutely dominate the battlefield. Archotech eyes also function as a good implant for cooks, doctors, and researchers by allowing for more precise work.
Install an archotech eye, increasing Sight by 38% for the first eye installed, and 12% for the second eye installed.

An installed archotech arm. Archotech arms have a damage rating roughly double that of a normal human fist as well as serious armor piercing ability. For reference, an unarmed hit with these arms will do roughly the same amount of damage as a normal steel mace. While they do indeed make for dangerous melee weapons by themselves, these arms truly shine when assigned to perform laborious tasks.
Install an archotech arm. Each arm installed increases Manipulation by 25%.

An installed archotech leg. Archotech legs allow for absurd agility and have the delicacy to allow one to move as stealthily as a ghost. These legs are great for anyone not adverse to body modding. Pretty much any task that requires one to walk a significant distance will be completed in far less time. Increased Moving improves Melee Dodge Chance by the equivalent of 4.5 levels of Melee skill per leg.
Install an archotech leg. Each leg installed increases Moving by 25%.
